snippet: In a well-run meeting, you get unvarnished advice from your peers. It’s one of the few ways to get a group of people to tell you what they really think of your ideas and plans.
abstract: In a well-run meeting, you get unvarnished advice from your peers. It’s one of the few ways to get a group of people to tell you what they really think of your ideas and plans.

headline.main: The Value of Peer-to-Peer Business Groups
